abstract: Four biographical stories from members of the General Public. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio.
description: Life changing events, the experience of Italian immigrants, tributes to loved ones. These four digital stories, created by members of the public and facilitated by ACMI staff, are a biographical record of things closest to the hearts of the participants.
